title: US Blocks Open Source 'Help' From These Countries
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: The Linux Foundation has released a comprehensive guide to help open source developers navigate the complex landscape of U.S. Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) sanctions.
cntitle: 美国阻止这些国家的开源“帮助”
cndescription: Linux 基金会发布了一份综合指南，旨在帮助开源开发者应对美国[外国资产控制办公室](OFAC)制裁的复杂局面。
